entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 3 except minus 4 near the Nunavut border.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this afternoon except snow near the Nunavut border. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm near the Nunavut border. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except minus 4 near the Nunavut border. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Snow near the Nunavut border. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
